title: Why Statement Coats Are the ‘Going-Out Tops’ of 2020
sub_head: As we continue to socialize outside, standout outerwear is the priority this winter—what’s underneath doesn’t matter
body:
THE SERIES of the season might be HBO’s “The Undoing,” and not just because the debauched, elite Manhattan milieu the murder mystery depicts could entertain the comatose. In our opinion, the textured green coat that leading lady Nicole Kidman wears throughout steals the show. As social distancing continues to push gatherings outside even into winter, such emphatically dramatic outerwear has become the starring garment in our wardrobes.
This was utterly clear on a crisp Wednesday evening in mid-November as I dressed for a...
